Sentencas: Contrary to hardened glass ceramics, compressive non-destructive seals for solid oxide cells (SOCs) could enable stack repairs without utilizing destructive separation methods.
Titulo: Performance of Non-Destructive Compressive Seals for Reversible Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: In light of increasing interest for high temperature steam electrolysis and energy storage, the performances of two commercially available compressive materials were investigated in humidified gas conditions: Thermiculite-866 and AFS-170 alumina felts.
Titulo: Performance of Non-Destructive Compressive Seals for Reversible Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: Mass loss and thermogravimetric (TGA) experiments carried out in inert, oxidizing, and reducing atmospheres at 800 degrees C showed no influence of the atmosphere on the alumina felts, and a reversible redox behavior for Thermiculite-866.
Titulo: Performance of Non-Destructive Compressive Seals for Reversible Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: Thermiculite-866 showed better cyclability compared to AFS-170 during SOC thermal cycling experiments.
Titulo: Performance of Non-Destructive Compressive Seals for Reversible Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: Initial open circuit voltages in dry H-2 were measured and compared to those obtained with commercial mica seals.
Titulo: Performance of Non-Destructive Compressive Seals for Reversible Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: The highest were recorded with Thermiculite-866, followed by mica and AFS-170.
Titulo: Performance of Non-Destructive Compressive Seals for Reversible Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: The species outgassed by Thermiculite-866 were quantified, and fluorine was found to be the main component released at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Performance of Non-Destructive Compressive Seals for Reversible Solid Oxide Cells
